title: The Truth Squad Takes Aim at Facebook
text:
Mark Zuckerberg’s headlong fall from epoch-shaping, world-connecting, community-building billionaire to monopoly-protecting, hate-speech-promoting, election-rigging avatar of evil (but still a billionaire, so there are some consolations) shows no sign of abating. He was on Capitol Hill again this week, adopting a gentle demeanor of saintly submission while under the lash from lawmakers.

The ostensible purpose of the hearing was to discuss Libra, the cryptocurrency the social media giant has been falteringly attempting to...
description: Mark Zuckerberg is right: Private companies shouldn’t be policing public debate.
